root.text: Is the person seizing (twitching, impaired consciousness)?

sofort.text:
⚠️ Seizure!
1. Make area safe (remove hard/sharp objects).
2. Do not restrain, nothing in the mouth.
3. Gently protect the head.
4. After seizure: recovery position, check breathing.
5. >5 minutes, repeated seizures, or injury → call 112.

unsicher.text: If unsure, call 112 and describe what you see.
